dialogue.text: People went crazy because of these creatures!
Once the city was bustling with life, but now...
It's not worth talking about. Most of them have locked themselves in their homes, they're afraid of monsters.
They live. People like me make sure they have something to eat. I bring them food every day.
dialogue.response: Why aren't you afraid of monsters?

dialogue.text: I can handle them. Someone has to defend the city.
